subject: Re: Same stupid nasty negative BS!
author: paracomm
full_text:
When people start calling themselves experts at something that is not or may never be fully understood the crap gets deep. I love these so called experts that tell us that we can only make contact using their exact methods and we need to refrain from any other way of doing research because in their eyes were just spinning our wheels. So we can't get communication from modified radios and were all just hearing what we want I guess.  I have heard it all,,"I wrote a book and im an expert" or "believe me that wont work, I know cause im physic".in one ear and out the other. Everyone is an expert these days and most of what they say is BS. If I start hearing someone or something talking through my dogs butt guess what im recording it.

Sounds like these so called experts are just trying to deter and silence anything they dont agree with by doing there Scientific tests. If it works it works and if it didnt work what the hell are we all still doing here.
